actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States requiring the advice and consent of the House of Representative in the making of treaties.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no treaty with respect to which the advice and consent of the Senate is required by section 2 of article II of the U.S. Constitution may be made without the advice and consent of the House of Representatives, two-thirds of the Representatives present concurring.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States requiring the advice and consent of the House of Representative in the making of treaties.
